title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 26 November 2008 - XWiki
content:

xwikibot - (26/11/2008 16:55): XWiki.denisjtorresg was modified by XWiki.denisjtorresg (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/denisjtorresg  
Hoffmann - (26/11/2008 17:16): hey all...little question....i just started a enterprise-xwiki-1.5 and deployed the standard config included i a x-archive...now i wanted to deploy another archive, but the admin-button in the right corner is gone...now?  
asyd - (26/11/2008 17:20): are you logged?  
Hoffmann - (26/11/2008 17:21): nope  
asyd - (26/11/2008 17:21): so, you must login :) (Admin/admin)  
Hoffmann - (26/11/2008 17:21): i than i got a nice "wrong user"  
Hoffmann - (26/11/2008 17:21): there was a administration button, now there is only a login and register button  
Hoffmann - (26/11/2008 17:22): wait a second....is this case sensitive?  
Hoffmann - (26/11/2008 17:23): oh man..realy...  
Hoffmann - (26/11/2008 17:23): got it
